mean_en: of, belonging to, or seeming to come from an early time in the very ancient past; very simple and old-fashioned, especially when something is also not convenient and comfortable
sentence: The primitive man made a fire in the cave.
sentence_trans: 原始人在洞内生了一堆火。
word_etyma: prim=prime最初的，原始的 + itive形容词后缀 → primitive原始的
